required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Low Oxygen Tension on the Early Development of Human Embryo in IVF/ICSI
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Low Oxygen Tension on the Early Development of Human Embryo in IVF/ICSI

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanxi Provincial Maternity and Children's Hospital

clinical_study.source: Shanxi Provincial Maternity and Children's Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the effect of low oxygen tension during in vitro culture in terms of embryo quality and outcomes of pregnancy in vitro fertilization/ Intracytoplasmic sperm injection

detailed_description.textblock:
The oocytes will be divided into two parts(two groups) form one patient. The two groups of oocytes will be cultured seperately in the incubator with the concentrations of 5% CO2,6%O2,89% N2(low oxygen concentration) verse 6% CO2,20% O2,74% N2(in atmosphere).
A series of observational measurement(embryo quality and outcomes of pregnancy) will be performed.

primary_outcome.description: Embryo morphology was assessed on day 2, day 3 day 4 day 5 day and 6 by considering the number of blastomeres, symmetry and granularity of blastomeres, type and percentage of fragmentation, presence of multinucleated blastomeres, and degree of compaction. Gardner's blastocyst scoring system is used for blastocyst assessment

arm_group.description: the oocytes and embryos are cultured in 5% oxygen concentration after oocytes retrieval until Day 6 (counting from fertilization)
the oocytes and embryos are cultured in 20% oxygen concentration (in atmosphere) after oocytes retrieval until Day 6(counting from fertilization)

intervention.description: the oocytes and embryos are cultured in the incubator with concentrations of 6% CO2,5%O2, and 89% N2

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Fresh cycles of in vitro fertilization/intracytoplasmic sperm injection and emrbyo transfer (IVF/ICSI-ET)
- ≥ 10 oocytes after oocyte retrieval
Exclusion Criteria:
- ≥ 3 transfer or oocyte retrieval cycles
- PGD/PGS cycles
- half-ICSI/rescure ICSI
- fluid in the uterine cavity, abnormal endometrium, uterine abnormalities,pelvic inflammation
- acute maternal problems.
- One or both spouses have an abnormal karyotype (including polymorphism)

overall_official.affiliation: Maternal and Children Health Care Hospital

facility.name: Maternal and Child Health Care Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Shanxi Provincial Maternity and Children's Hospital
